box1.title: RAAC can perform various audits for you
box1.text: RAAC can perform various audits for you. You can think of the following: The internal audits. (According to the 3 P's : Product, Process, Procedure) External audit at supplier or outsourced work addresses according to the three P's. During these audits , it is also possible to take the ISO9001, AS9100 and or Nadcap requirements into account during the assessment. If necessary, we can perform the entire process for your organization including resolution of any defects found and /or attention points.
